issue.title: TF data from ignition does not follow REP 105

content.raw:
@{5be108d7216ccf49622e6b67} it looks like the chief problem here is that on the ignition branch we’ve been testing on the /<robot\_name>/odom topic has been updated to have /<robot\_name>/odom → /<robot\_name>/base\_link whereas the debian install still has /<robot\_name>/odom → /base\_link which is creating a mess of your TF tree. \(please check to confirm this is an issue for you by echoing your /<robot\_name>/odom topic and checking frame\_id and child\_frame\_id\)

I can push up a fix for you but it would be working in reverse so let’s see if Nate has any pointers on how to update.

@{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} how do we get this update on the debian install of subt?
